profile:
Welcome to Laszlo Renovation. We are here to help with all your residential and commercial painting needs.  Our Services:  Painting (interior and exterior) , wallpaper installation and removal, plastering, taping, stucco ceilings, smooth ceilings, deck and fence staining. We have flexible hours based on the projects we're working on. We use quality brands of paints such as Benjamin Moore, Sherwin Williams, DULUX or the customer's choice. 

Contact us today to schedule your appointment.

profile:
Time for a fresh coat of paint? Look no further! We start by repairing the deficiencies on those surfaces, we shape up those walls and then we apply a fresh coat of paint with a luxury finish! Every home deserves a quality look and feel so we strive to achieve that on every project we take on.

Our services include home Interior, Exterior, and custom Stain work! We know you want the right painter for the right job, so this season, we now offer exclusive pricing for a full home Interiors and much more!
products: Wall Paint, Wall Primer, Quick Dry Compound, Ceiling Paint, Stains, (Acrylic and Oil Base)
services: PTG Painting, Wall Repairs, PTG Prime, PTG Trim, PTG Doors, Window Frames, Stain Stairs/Railings
brands: Behr, Dulux, Sherwin Williams, Benjamin Moore, McNamara & Reynolds
specialities: We specialize in professional interior/exterior painting services. We also provide various Stain services.
warranty_terms: Warranty and Terms are directly aligned with the paint product provider we are partnered with.
